content.text: A shaft of cylindrical steel yield strength $700 \text{ MPa}$ is subject to static consisting of bending Moment $10 \text{ kNm}$ and twisting Moment $20 \text{ kNm}$. Find the shaft diameter using maximum principle and maximum shear theory. FOS $= 2$ and Young's modulus $210 \text{ GPa}$ $v = 0.25$.
